segments.text: I'm standing here, just watching this scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen seems ordinary enough at first glance, but something is definitely amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely focused on her task, almost serenely so.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the faucet is still running, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge of the counter in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming on the floor, spreading rapidly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, submerged in the cold water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she shows no sign of noticing; her expression remains utterly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s astounding how oblivious she is to the mounting disaster around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous sheet of water down the cabinet doors is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the splash or seen the rising tide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is truly bizarre.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so engrossed in such a simple chore?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the damage this water will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR
